#text=I was riding by bicycle along the river trail this morning when I noticed that something did n't seem right .
#text=My front tire was n't as firm as it usually is , and the situation was getting worse .
#text=I stopped pedaling , got off the bike , and put my ear to the tire .
#text=I could hear a faint hissing sound .
#text=I was miles from home -- too far to walk back , and nowhere near a repair shop .
#text=Fortunately , I keep a patch kit that I bought at the local bike shop in my backpack .
#text=I took the backpack off , rummaged around inside for the repair kit , and grabbed it .
#text=It had been a year since I last used it , but I got the hang of it .
#text=I found the exact spot of the hole in the tire , patched it , and then re-inflated the tire .
#text=My hands were dirty , but I was able to ride home without any further trouble .
